summary: Allows the merging of multiple config objects into dojo config.

methods.name: merge

parameters.name: mergeConfigs
parameters.summary: A list of module ids to load and merge. If null, the merge key of dojoConfig will be used.

parameters.name: target
parameters.summary: An object to merged the config objects into. If null, dojoConfig itself will be used.

methods.returnDescription: Will resolve when the merge is complete
